Command.CommandString: SELECT WCS_TASK.*, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,CMD_Product.ProductName,CMD_Product.Spec, Sys_TableState.StateDesc,S1.InStationNo,S1.OutStationNo, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('5','6')) then S1.InStationNo when WCS_TASK.TaskType in('12','13') or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('0','1','2','3','4','7','9')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode else '' end) FromStation, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('5','6','7','9')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode when WCS_TASK.TaskType in('12') or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('0','1','2','3','4')) then S1.OutStationNo when WCS_TASK.TaskType='13' then WCS_TASK.ToCellCode else '' end) ToStation FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on WCS_TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode Left join CMD_Product ON WCS_TASK.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskLevel DESC, WCS_TASK.RequestDate,WCS_TASK.StartDate

SELECT WCS_TASK.TaskNo, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,Sys_TableState.StateDesc, WCS_TASK.ProductCode,CMD_Product.ProductName,CMD_Product.Spec, WCS_TASK.CellCode, convert(varchar(20),WCS_TASK.StartDate,120) StartDate, convert(varchar(20),WCS_TASK.FinishDate,120) FinishDate,convert(varchar(20),WCS_TASK.TaskDate,120) TaskDate FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on WCS_TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode Left join CMD_Product ON WCS_TASK.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.StartDate

SELECT CMD_Cell.ProductCode,CMD_Product.ProductNo,CMD_Product.ProductName,CMD_Product.Spec,sum(case CMD_Cell.ProductCode when '0001' then Quantity else Quantity*4 end) Total FROM CMD_Cell Left join CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode Where {0} group by CMD_Cell.ProductCode,CMD_Product.ProductNo,CMD_Product.ProductName,CMD_Product.Spec ORDER BY CMD_Cell.ProductCode

SELECT CellCode ,S1.StateDesc IsActive,CMD_Cell.ProductCode,CMD_Product.ProductName,CMD_Product.Spec,BillNo,(case CMD_Cell.ProductCode when '0001' then Quantity else Quantity*4 end) Quantity,S2.StateDesc IsLock,convert(varchar(20),CMD_Cell.InDate,120) InDate, datediff(d,CMD_Cell.InDate,getdate()) StockDays FROM CMD_Cell Left join CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState S1 on S1.TableName='CMD_Cell' and S1.FieldName='IsActive' and CMD_Cell.IsActive=S1.State LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState S2 on S2.TableName='CMD_Cell' and S2.FieldName='IsLock' and CMD_Cell.IsLock=S2.State Where {0} ORDER BY CMD_Cell.ProductCode,CMD_Cell.InDate
sp_GetCell
sp_GetEmptyCell
sp_GetFullCell
Sp_TaskProcess
Sp_UpdateTaskState
Sp_UpdateTaskCellCode
Sp_CreateInTask
Sp_CreateOutTask
SELECT * FROM WCS_TASK Where TaskNo=@TaskNo
SELECT Distinct StationNo FROM CMD_Shelf Order by StationNo

SELECT WCS_ProducePlan.*,CMD_Product.ProductName,state.StateDesc FROM WCS_ProducePlan left join CMD_Product on WCS_ProducePlan.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode left join Sys_TableState AS state ON WCS_ProducePlan.State = state.State AND state.TableName = 'WCS_ProducePlan' AND state.FieldName = 'State' Order by BillDate Desc,BillID

INSERT INTO WCS_ProducePlan(BillID, BillDate, ProductCode, Pallets, AdjustedPallets, Adjuster, AdjustedTime, State, Memo,Creator,CreateDate) values(@BillID, @BillDate, @ProductCode, @Pallets, @AdjustedPallets, @Adjuster, getdate(), @State, @Memo,@Creator,getdate())
Update WCS_ProducePlan set AdjustedPallets=@AdjustedPallets, Adjuster=@Adjuster, AdjustedTime=getdate(), Memo=@Memo where BillID=@BillID
delete from WCS_ProducePlan WHERE BillID=@BillID
Select * From WCS_WorkMode
Update WCS_WorkMode set WorkMode=@WorkMode,ProductCode=@ProductCode, ProductName=@ProductName, OutQty=@OutQty,ChangeTime=getdate()
update WCS_ProducePlan set State=@State where BillID=@BillID

select task.*,cell.CELL_NAME,shelf.SHELF_NAME from WCS_Task task inner join CMD_WH_CELL cell on task.CellCode=cell.CELL_CODE inner join CMD_WH_SHELF shelf on cell.SHELF_CODE=shelf.SHELF_CODE where TaskTmp=1 and TaskNo=@TaskNo
update CMD_Cell Set IsLock=@IsLock,ProductCode=@ProductCode,BillNo=@BillNo where CellCode=@CellCode)
update CMD_Cell Set {0} where {1}
update WCS_TASK set State=@State,StartDate=getdate() where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WMS_BillMaster set State=@State where BillID=@BillID
update WCS_TASK set State=@State where TaskNo in (select top 1 TaskNo from WCS_TASK where State='1' and TaskType='11' and CarNo=@CarNo order by StartDate)
update WCS_TASK set CraneErrCode=@CraneErrCode,CraneErrDesc=@CraneErrDesc where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set State=@State where TaskNo=@TaskNo
select SHELF_NAME,SHELF_CODE from CMD_WH_SHELF shelf inner join CMD_WH_AREA area on shelf.AREA_CODE=area.AREA_CODE where area.AREA_Type=1

SELECT CMD_Cell.CellCode, CMD_Cell.CellName, CMD_Cell.AreaCode, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Cell.ShelfCode, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Cell.CellRow, CMD_Cell.CellColumn, CMD_Cell.IsActive, CMD_Cell.Priority, CMD_Cell.PalletCode, CMD_Cell.PalletBarcode, CMD_Cell.ProductCode, CMD_Product.ProductName, CMD_Cell.BillNo, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName, CMD_Cell.Quantity, CMD_Cell.IsLock, CMD_Cell.ErrorFlag, CMD_Cell.InDate, CMD_Cell.Memo FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = CMD_Product.ProductCode ORDER BY CMD_Cell.CellCode

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Product.ProductName,WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = CMD_Product.ProductCode order by CMD_Cell.CellCode

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, VCMD_Product.ProductName,VCMD_Product.Spec, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN VCMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = VCMD_Product.ProductCode Where {0} order by Priority Desc,CMD_Cell.CellCode
